1680200.name: Finding A Prince: The Game Soundtrack
1680200.description:
Contains:

The Track has a total of 25 complete songs and also comes with a few wallpapers for your computer. These songs all come in .Mp3 format, and the wallpapers are art found in the game made by our lovely artist Xonitum. There are a total of 10 Wallpapers for personal use.

Legal Talk:

This is the lovely soundtrack of Finding A Prince: The game, which we've lovingly called the F.A.P. Track. These songs are done by our composer Geraint Downing who can be found on most social medias. These songs are owned by Gunshot Studio's, however with proper credit and proof of purchase it can be used by others within their game. This requires you to purchase the Soundtrack, not just the game. The art is NOT for replication by any means and should not be use for any commercial games.
